authorJudge: MR. JUSTICE QAZI MUHAMMAD AMIN AHMED
tagline: Every crime is repugnant, murder being most abhorrent and shocking; impacts and aftermaths of violence upon the victims, their families and surroundings are seldom benign with fear invariably concomitant thereof, nonetheless, special jurisdiction under the Anti-Terrorism Act, 1997 has been created to deal with situations enumerated in section 6 thereof; these fall outside the ambit of personal pursuits and vendettas, carried out through violence.
